data.name: Amber Time [RPG]
data.detailed_description:
Amber time is a relaxing and leisure game, with a big map of the open world, a variety of travel styles, more than ten cities, and a vast Southern Ocean
Amber time is also a growth game for billionaires. Do you want to be a billionaire? In amber time, you can become a reality
Amber time is a pixel cartoon RPG, which uses photorealistic and ambient lighting technology

This is a role-playing game in modern times. We live in a modern metropolis, rushing through all kinds of temptations and hopes. What we can do is to work hard, make money or make money,

We need to buy sports cars, RV, all kinds of weapons, eat all kinds of food, large and luxurious mansions and so on. A world full of desire can look forward to the prosperity of stocks like shareholders,

You can also buy companies like an entrepreneur, or you can farm and work like an ordinary person, or you can be an explorer and go to the wild to dig for minerals;

Find a companion and live a happy life

Private cars, subways and buses are all good means of transportation in the city

The experience you want in the real world may be in the game. Come and feel the desire for money.

You can take the train to different cities and settle down in different places. It's not expensive to spend some time

This is a survival game. Life is only once. Death means the end of the game

To live in this world, you need food to rest. If you are not strong enough, your life will begin to decline



One day, you will become rich and despise everything in the world



Amber world, feel the desire of money together! RPG with free role



Mobile key: W, A, S, D

Accelerating movement: shift

Equipment and weapon: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 0

Attack: right click

Pick up: E

Use or open: F

Defense strategy:

Basic defense: Advanced bulletproof vest

Car defense: tanks, mecha, etc

Item defense: Invincible pill, trophy



Survival strategy:

Attack method: attack all kinds of characters and fight monsters in the wild

Hanging up mode: stall

Active mode: fishing, working and field mining

Captive breeding: raising poultry

Seed value mode: planting vegetables, fruits, etc

Passive way: buy various companies

Exploration methods: scavenging and treasure picking in the South China Sea



Acceleration strategy:

Stall business: Fortune Potion

Ride: oil bucket

Mobile acceleration: F1, sports car

Field survival: all kinds of RV

Physical strength to life: dynamic cycling

Time acceleration: TV, bath, bed

Physical strength maintenance: air conditioning



Life strategy:

Villa: store goods, materials, vehicles, life, breeding, etc

Rescue strategy:

Small range teleport: rescue package

Trans City teleport: transmitter

data.short_description: Amber world, let's feel the desire for money! Are you willing to accept this challenge and become a billionaire?
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win7,Win10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support Dx11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win7,Win10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
